sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-stepper v-model="e1">
		<v-stepper-header>
			<v-stepper-step :complete="e1 > 1" step="1">Choose a File</v-stepper-step>

			<v-divider></v-divider>

			<v-stepper-step :complete="e1 > 2" step="2">Choose Area</v-stepper-step>

			<v-divider></v-divider>

			<v-stepper-step step="3">Finalize</v-stepper-step>
	</v-stepper-header>

	<v-stepper-items>

		<v-stepper-content step="1">

			<ChooseFile />


			<v-btn
				:disabled="!(imgURL) && !(image)"
				color="primary"
				@click="e1 = 2"
				>
				Continue
			</v-btn>

		</v-stepper-content>

		<v-stepper-content step="2">

			<v-btn
				color="primary"
				@click="e1 = 3"
			>
				Crop
			</v-btn>

			<v-btn text @click.native="back">Back</v-btn>
		</v-stepper-content>

		<v-stepper-content step="3">

				<v-btn
					color="primary"
					@click="e1 = 1"
				>

					Download 

				</v-btn>
				<v-btn text @click.native="back">Back</v-btn>
				<v-btn text @click.native="reset">Reset</v-btn>

		</v-stepper-content>

    </v-stepper-items>

  </v-stepper>
</template>

<script>
import ChooseFile from './ChooseFile.vue'
import jcropp from 'jcrop'

export default {
	name: "Steps",
	components: { ChooseFile },

	data: function() {
		return {
			e1: 1
		}
	},

	methods: {
		back: function() {
			this.e1 -= 1
		},

		reset: function() {
			this.e1 = 1
		}
	},

	computed: {
		image() {
			return this.$store.getters.image
		},

		imgURL() {
			return this.$store.getters.imgURL
		}
	}
}
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
.v-stepper {
	width: 90%;
	margin: 5em auto;
}
</style>
